import React, { useState } from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart , addProductToCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const products = useSelector((state) => state.cart) let totalAmount = 0 const itemTotal = (p,q) => { let rp = p.replace(',', '') let iT = rp*q totalAmount +=iT return iT } const total = () =>{ } console.log(products) if(!products) return 'Loading...' return (
{products.length === 0 ?

{product.productName}

{product.productVersion}

{product.qty}
{`${product.productPrice}/- Rs`}

dispatch(removeProductFromCart(product.id))}>{product.productName}

//
))}

{product.productName}

{`${product.productPrice} X ${product.qty} =`}

{itemTotal(product.productPrice, product.qty)}

))}

Total : {totalAmount} RS

) } export default Cart
